Title: Under Siege
Actors: Steven Seagal, Damian Chapa, Troy Evans, David McKnight
Plot: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.
Production: Alcor Films, Warner Bros., Canal+, Regency Enterprises
